title: Perplexity AI
summary: An AI-powered search engine that gives you direct answers with cited sources. Like having a research assistant that reads the entire internet for you.
content:
Perplexity AI reimagines search. Instead of a list of blue links, you get a direct, well-sourced answer to your question. It reads multiple sources, synthesizes the information, and presents it with inline citations so you can verify everything.

The Pro tier adds more powerful AI models, file uploads, and image generation. But even the free version is remarkably useful for research, fact-checking, and learning. Ask it anything from "what's the best budget standing desk" to "explain quantum computing" and get a concise, cited response.

What makes Perplexity special is the focus on accuracy over creativity. Every claim is backed by a source. You can click through to read the original articles, follow up with clarifying questions, and build a collection of research threads. It's the tool that finally makes AI search trustworthy.
